Articles.Content: How... did you derp that badly, and where are you?

I think he did what Danny2462 did on Ike on one of his videos,

The Kerbal somehow manages to be sideways on the pole and think he's still standing up,

I wonder what happens if you poke him....

This is what happens when you're in EVA and you switch camera modes from Free to Orbital or Chase.

Protip: never switch to chase mode while in EVA in orbit or freely moving in space.
